full_summary:
# Tender Invitation
## EZ113-242110: CFAD Rocky Point Remediation Program in Victoria, B.C.

**Tender Reference**: WS4590298776

**Procurement Category**: Contracting and Service (CNST)

**Publication Date**: May 21, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: June 10, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

### Contract Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified bidders to submit a tender for the remediation of contaminated soil at the Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Rocky Point Site 3ad/10 in Victoria, B.C.

The project involves excavating and transporting contaminated soil located at the former landfill and steam-out hut site to a permitted disposal facility. The site has been decommissioned prior to 2017, and the project must be completed by October 31, 2024.

### SCOPE OF WORK
The remediation project includes the following activities:

* Excavation of contaminated soil
* Transportation of contaminated soil to a permitted disposal facility

### TERM AND CONDITIONS
* **Scope of Work**: The scope of work shall include all activities necessary to complete the remediation project.
* **Duration**: The contract duration is from the date of contract award to October 31, 2024.
* **Payment Terms**: The payment terms shall be [insert payment terms].

### HOW TO ACCESS THE TENDER DOCUMENT

Please visit the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19773267?extsite=MTk3NzMyNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19773267?extsite=MTk3NzMyNjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for more information on this tender opportunity.

**CONTACT INFORMATION**
For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact:
Wong, Summer
SPAC/PSPC
summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
